Detailed Description

HttpPostEntity transforms post key/value pair to byte stream. 

 HttpPostEntity hpe;
 hpe.addParameter(gaia::base::String("id"), gaia::base::String("1024"));

size_t gaia::net::HttpPostEntity::addParameter ( const gaia::base::String &  key,
const gaia::base::String &  value 
)

Add a parameter to the POST entity.

POST supports multiple values share the same key, thus value won't be reset if caller passed a key that is existed in the parameter list.

Parameters:
keyKey of the parameter.
valueValue of the parameter.
